title: Ticket #2352: No HoldCodeReason is set when you hold a job via the SOAP interface
description:
Noticed today that no HoldCodeReason is set if you hold a job via the SOAP interface. Makes periodic release statements slightly trickier to write.

Could I get a unique hold code set for holds triggered by the SOAP interface?
